In this episode of SinFronteras we conclude our tour of the city of Valletta, visiting iconic places of this city as the historic Manuel Theater one of the oldest in Europe. We will enjoy the best views from the balconies of the Barrakka Gardens, then head to Fort San Elmo and across the bay to visit the famous Three Cities.
